whyItMatters.title: What could you do with an extra day?
whyItMatters.text: Time back is a collective resource. When every teammate wins a quieter day, we can invest in care, curiosity, and the people often left waiting.

howItWorks.title: Holiday blueprint
howItWorks.desc: Pull together itineraries, flight recommendations, weather snapshots, and hotel holds into a beautiful template you can share instantly.

howItWorks.title: Shopping studio
howItWorks.desc: Keep self-filling carts, shipment tracking, and spending patterns in one calm space so restocking and gifting take zero effort.

howItWorks.title: Ops & comms
howItWorks.desc: Coordinate escalations, email briefs, and dashboards so updates land before issues grow legs.

cta.title: Take back your time. One day at a time.
